validation.validation:
The Disability Status Reference isn’t valid for 1 of the following reasons:
It's for a previous disability status that isn’t on the job application.
It's for a previous disability status that’s on the job application, but the Disability Status Last Updated On date (v35) or System Current Date (all versions) is on or after August 1, 2020.
It's for a new disability status, but the Disability Status Last Updated On date (v35) or System Current Date (all versions) is before August 1, 2020.
Disability Status Last Updated On can’t be after today.
Disability Status Last Updated On can’t be before the Job Application Applied Date.
